    • Field Detail

      • DELIMITER

        public static final String DELIMITER
        String representing the delimiter that should be used, when passing values to Configuration Options fields, inside the Configuration File.

        ex: host -> "some value here"

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static APIConfigurationReader getInstance​(String pathToConfFile)
        Public Static Factory method to instantiate an APIConfigurationReader(String) object.

        pathToConfFile - String to pass the path to the API configuration file.
        Returns:
        #APIConfigurationReader instance.

      • getConfigurationsParameters

        public static Map<String,​com.dffrs.util.APIConfigurationReader.ConfigurationOptions> getConfigurationsParameters()
        Public static method to return all configuration parameters, i.e. Configuration options and their ids.
        Returns:
        HashMap structure with all configuration parameters loaded. (See loadConfigurationParameters()).

      • getFilePath

        public String getFilePath()
        Public method to return the current Configuration Options file being used.
        Returns:
        String representing the path.

      • getConfigurations

        public Map<String,​String> getConfigurations()
                                           throws FileNotFoundException,
                                                  PatternSyntaxException,
                                                  ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException,
                                                  IllegalStateException
        Public method that is responsible to load API configuration options through the specified file path, given when APIConfigurationReader instance was created. It compares each element read to confParameter entries. Everytime it fails to map the String read to an entry, it adds a NULL reference, i.e.

        |-(String matched) --------> (confParameter entry equivalent) map -|-(String that failed) ----> null (...)

        Returns:
        HashMap structure containing every #ConfigurationOptions found.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - Whenever the Configuration Options file was not found.
        PatternSyntaxException
        ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        IllegalStateException
